subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Genesis: In the Beginning
description: A quick win: understand Genesis: In the Beginning.

hook.text: 'Let there be light.' Four words launched a creation story shared by Jews, Christians, and Muslims.

buildup.text: Genesis describes God creating the world in six days and resting on the seventh. Humans came from dust.

discovery.text: Adam and Eve lived in paradise until a serpent tempted them. Eating the forbidden fruit brought knowledge and death.

twist.text: Genesis isn't just origin. It's a moral lesson: knowledge has a cost. Freedom leads to responsibility and suffering.

climax.text: Three religions share this creation story but interpret it very differently. One text, three civilizations.

punchline.text: Four words created the world. Three religions built civilizations on them.

quiz.question: What is the moral lesson embedded in the Genesis creation story?
options: Knowledge comes with responsibility and cost
